response.overview: Nuru masseuse Alison Tyler pampers her client Abby Cross with a sensual rub, relaxing the dancer's tight muscles, in her legs and in between. Ryan Ryans' husband hires masseuse Abigail Mac to treat his hot wife to her first Nuru massage, and subsequently, her first lesbian experience. Things get carried away when masseuse coworkers Sasha Heart and Alix Lynx massage each other after their client cancels. Layla London treats her best friend Blair Williams to a relaxing Nuru Massage before her bachelorette party starts. Teen Uma Jolie gets her step mother Savana Styles to teach her how to work in the massage business.
response.tagline: Appearance, Lesbian, Massage, Massage Parlor, Niche, Oiled, Popular with Women,
response.title: Goo Girls
